name: log4j2.yml
configuration:
Configuration:
  status: error
  name: LoggerYamlConfiguration
  Appenders:
    Console:    
      name: ConsoleAppender
      PatternLayout:
        Pattern: "%d{${LOG_DATEFORMAT_PATTERN:-yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS}} ${LOG_LEVEL_PATTERN:-%5p} ${sys:PID} [%15.15t] %-40.40C{1.} : %m%n${LOG_EXCEPTION_CONVERSION_WORD:-%wEx}"
        Charset: "UTF-8"
    Socket:
        name: SocketAppender
        host: localhost
        port: 7070
        JsonLayout:
            eventEol: true
            compact: true
            properties: true
            locationInfo: true
            objectMessageAsJsonObject: true
  Loggers:
    Root:
      level: info
      includeLocation: true
      AppenderRef:
        - ref: SocketAppender
        - ref: ConsoleAppender
    logger:
      - name: org.hibernate
        level: error
